list_of_reviews.review_title: Potential criminal enterprise - extreme negligence at best
list_of_reviews.review: I have had a kraken account for years and all was fine, till some weeks ago a verification request came up. I have sent all required documents various times, got in contact with them and was told everything was fine and to wait. My account is completely legal, the funds are of transparent origin, all my paperwork is in order and I have complied every step of the way. Nevertheless, all of a sudden my access to the account and the funds has been cut off. I have no idea if kraken has illegally appropriated my funds or what is going on. Their support desk is completely unresponsive, complaints are not taken serious at all, in most cases not even answered. If you have an account there, close it, take your money and run. I regret deeply entrusting them with my money, big mistake

list_of_reviews.review_title: I opened an account which was promptly terminated without explanation by Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I opened an account.  Submitted my proof of residence.  Deposited a small amount of money. Within a week I receive a notice that my account is being closed with no explanation "due to security reasons".   My mailing address is a PO Box in Massachusetts.  I submitted my electric bill as proof of address.  Duh, the mailing address on my mail is to the PO Box so of course proof shows the PO Box.   License shows physical address.  So I am not sure why the account was closed.  I was told to withdraw my initial deposited funds.  Money was returned.  Seems to me this is a "business" that does not want peoples business.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken is a crock of s h i t
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken is a crock of s h i t. My deposit was flagged as suspicious by the bank and when I queried this with Kraken I got an email informing me my account will be closed and I can’t open another account.No explanation, no reason.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken canceled my account after I made…
list_of_reviews.review: Kraken canceled my account after I made a test deposit to verify deposit. Now they won't refund my balance or give me a reason for closing the account. As far as I know, I didn't violate any of the KYC requirements. For me Kraken was a really bad choice. Use at your own risk.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Had some elicit transactions in my bank…
list_of_reviews.review: Had some elicit transactions in my bank account with Kraken as a source of funds which had been transfered.  Was able to log into Kraken and noticed 1/2 bogus transactions.  Reported problem to them and have since emailed and called numerous times.  Account has been closed leaving me with no recourse other than waiting. They did send emails showing they had voided the transactions, but after almost a month, still cannot log in.

list_of_reviews.review_title: HORRIBLE Company to Deal With
list_of_reviews.review: I would like to confirm every bad review you read about Kraken.  Terrible customer service.  They will close your account without any attempt to remedy the alleged problem.  Apparently I was very lucky that I had not been able to complete any purchases before they did this to me.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kraken are thieves. Ticket#12566698
list_of_reviews.review: I don't know where I should even start. The customer experience cannot get worse than this. It's a straight robbery. I deposited with Interac transfer a few days ago 3000 CAD into my Kraken account and received confirmation from both the bank and Interac that the money was collected. Ticket number #12566698. Reaching out to the live chat wasn't a fruitful idea - they have made me wait for 6 hours a few times and never got a response. The only response was an auto-reply saying I would receive an email which I never did! My bank cannot recall the transfer so my money went to nowhere! Happy Halving Day (for Kraken, not investors)!Beware of this!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible service
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible service. My ticket has been pending for months and there is no other follow up than some standard templates im being sent. I cannot log into my account because their verification system does not allow me to upload the right documents. Kraken is not following up correctly. The moment I can log in again I will take all my money and leave Kraken. This is ridiculous.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I wish I could leave a zero star
list_of_reviews.review: I wish I could leave a zero stars for support! I opened an account so that I could offramp some XRP. I can understand that my initial proof of address was rejected as part of the verification, but it has been a nightmare ever since I tried to correct that. Support reached out asking for this proof, which I gave. I have been ghosted for the past two weeks, and whenever I reach out to live support (which takes 3 hours) I am told the ticket is still open.I have asked to close the account because I found an alternative, and the support also says I should email my request to the same person who is ghosting me. It seems creating an account works like clockwork, but deleting one is practically impossible.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I made a fair profit using Kraken
list_of_reviews.review: I made a fair profit using Kraken. I did buy and stake Bitcoin at $40,000, along with whatever ETH, SOL, and ADA were priced at the time (January 2024).I have sold Bitcoin around $60,000 (April 2024). The other assets went up roughly the same, so I made about 50% profit.There are alot of transanction fees and I didn't realise the "earn" function was sent to third parties for their profit. But overall I made a profit and got my money back, so am satisfied.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid Kraken at all costs - Terrible experience
list_of_reviews.review: I would strongly advise against using Kraken. On April 4th, 2024, I transferred a significant amount of money into my Kraken account. As of today, the funds are still being held by the platform. I have reached out to their support team multiple times, and all they have said is that they have a high volume of requests and that they have escalated my issue to a specialized team.This is completely unacceptable. It feels like outright fraud to hold onto customers' money indefinitely with no resolution in sight. There are much better cryptocurrency exchanges out there that provide reliable service and timely transactions. Do yourself a favor and avoid Kraken - it's just not worth the headache and potential loss of your hard-earned money. Terrible experience overall.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Excellent and helpful and efficient support service
list_of_reviews.review: I have had almost immediate help that was very efficient from Kraken support on several occasions the last time was 26th March Cant understand why people are complaining Amongst the lowest fees too. Much better functionality than Coinbase

list_of_reviews.review_title: My pending withdawal was on hold for a…
list_of_reviews.review: My pending withdawal was on hold for a month now. I emailed 10 times to kraken support for any update on my withdrawal. They just keep ignoring my email and never email me back. Terrible customer support seriously

list_of_reviews.review_title: Not Great
list_of_reviews.review: This platform is quite hostile to users. 1.Lost of hidden behind the scene messy doings. 2.Very high fees on everything, for nothing. 3.They like to hold your account hostage often and at all the worst possible times. I have experienced blocks and locks and all manner of interference and corresponding loses.4.Every single support requests results on very lengthy and tech complex 'KYC' audits and compliances 'requests' instead of fixing anything.Their KYC's is 'requested' very very often, not once, but repeatedly anytime they are contacted for support or for anything else regardless of having already gone through their whole system of supposed KYC. 5. Support, contacts and queries are passed along from 'agent's to 'agent's and never answered. Then the whole thing repeats again.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Blocked my account with all my money
list_of_reviews.review: Blocked my account with all my money! Support doesn't answer anything.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible.Shut my account down for no reason - no explanation given.Had to cash out my crypto to fiat and transfer to bank account (not just transfer to another wallet or exchange).Just given 72hrs to do it, and some of my crypto was on a dip, so cashing out cost me, then it'll cost me again to buy it back.Terrible lack of customer service, they just said:Unfortunately, we must inform you that we will be closing your Kraken account. For security purposes, we cannot disclose the reason for this action.Please note that you still have a balance on your Kraken account. Therefore, we request that you complete the following actions within the next 72 hours (from the time and date of this message):• Convert your crypto to cash and withdraw your remaining balance to a bank account in your own name.• Export all your trade and ledger history as we will be unable to provide it to you later.Deposit services have already been disabled for your account. After the 72 hours have passed, your account will be closed.Kindly note that you cannot open another Kraken account. We may reach out to you if we require additional documentation.We appreciate your understanding.That's what they said, and looking at forums it's happening to a lot of people who are mystified as to why.A real shame, as the exchange is functionally good, but as for customer service, totally diabolical.STEER CLEAR

list_of_reviews.review_title: My transfer from my Kraken Spot account…
list_of_reviews.review: My transfer from my Kraken Spot account to the Kraken Future account has been pending for 3 days. Support ticket was created after 30 minutes whereafter a customer service responded that he would create a support ticket for me and that I would be contacted on email, which no one has done. So disappointing that such a large company cannot manage transfers between my own account's portfolios... Public ID: AA44 N84G IU4P UCEQ

list_of_reviews.review_title: KRAKEN WILL REPLY ONCE BUT WILL NOT HELP YOU
list_of_reviews.review: April 18, 2024 UPDATEA phone appointment finally account verified had 7000.00 now 1555.00 some idiot moves our money to ETH Kraken steals your money and will not give you access to your account on line I have been trying to get to my account since March 15,2024 and kraken will not assist and a police report has been filed and still nothing as far as I am concerned kraken has stolen $7000.00 so don’t use them unless you like giving your money away.also one star is giving them too much credit more like zero stars!! This company of course will reply to this and do nothing they do not help you so please so not use this company they will take your funds and they do not help you get back into your account!! Over 30 days and they did nothing but keep my 7000.00 and I am going to report them to anyone and everyone who will listen because I have proof and this is my account my funds and they will not helping me so please be very careful and never believe anyone who calls you too many scammers out there and as far as I am concerned kraken is a scam. And they never answer there phones and when you do leave your number for them to call back they never do!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid at all costs!
list_of_reviews.review: I decided to open an account on Kraken and invest some of my savings in Bitcoin. After providing all the required information, I received confirmation of my account setup within just a few minutes. Additionally, they granted me Intermediate status. On the same day, I transferred $5,000 (their bank took its commission) and bought 0.06799729 BTC. Kraken took their fee plus they probably converted dollars into euros at a rate known only to them. Nevertheless, I was satisfied - I invested almost 5000 dollars in Bitcoin, now it was just a matter of waiting calmly for the exchange rate to rise. I was mistaken. On next day, I received an email from Kraken with information that my account will be closed. They gave me 72 hours to sell the BTC and withdraw the money. They provided no reason for such a decision! They wrote: "For security purposes, we cannot disclose the reason for this action"It is worth noting that these 72 hours fell on Saturday and Sunday, furthermore, it was Easter holidays.I sold the BTC I owned (they charged another fee) and transferred the money to my dollar account (another exchange). As a result I lost several hundred dollars. So avoid!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Photo id verification is terrible
list_of_reviews.review: Photo id is terrible.  I get it that the FEDs are overreaching cause they're envious of money being made but Kraken is playing into their hand by making impossible to access my account, so I'm going to close my account after some 8 years.
